name: Cal AI — Edamam Nutrition Lookup Tool

parameters.toolDescription: Get nutrition for a food item. Parameter ingr: ingredient with quantity in English — e.g. "3 eggs", "200g chicken breast", "1 cup oatmeal". Edamam returns calories, protein (PROCNT), fat (FAT), carbs (CHOCDF). Use when user wants to add a meal by text (e.g. "добавь 3 яйца", "200g chicken").

parameters.name: ingr
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('ingr', 'Ingredient with quantity in English — e.g. 3 eggs, 200g chicken breast, 1 cup oatmeal', 'string') }}
